item.title: 中国前国防部长因腐败问题被开除党籍
item.description: 据中国国家电视台报道，中国已开除前国防部长李尚福的党籍。【原文：China has expelled former defense minister Li Shangfu from the Communist Party, according to state television.】

item.title: 需求激增，瑞银调整私人资产基金销售方式
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）正试图将该行所有的私人市场产品集中到一个部门，以巩固其在全球有限合伙人中排名前五的地位。【原文：UBS Group AG is seeking to cement its position as top-five player among global limited partners, by pooling all of the bank’s private-markets offerings into one unit.】

item.title: 银行家称 2024 年损益表 "本应很棒"，却只是 "不错 "而已
item.description: 年初的一系列巨额交易未能转化为并购的持续复苏，此前的势头因各国央行的畏缩和地缘政治的不安而受阻。【原文：A flurry of megadeals early in the year failed to translate into a sustained recovery in mergers and acquisitions, after the momentum was stymied by skittish central banks and geopolitical unease.】

item.title: 高盛称对冲基金 "激进 "抛售科技股
item.description: 根据高盛集团的分析，在英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）短暂成为全球最大公司的一个月里，对冲基金 "积极 "抛售科技股。【原文：In a month when Nvidia Corp. briefly became the world’s largest company, hedge funds were “aggressively” selling tech stocks, according to analysis from Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 印度信贷将受益于指数相关债券流动
item.description: 在印度 2 万亿美元的固定收益市场上，为数不多的女性公司经营者之一表示，随着印度加入全球债券指数，流入印度的资金将逐渐流入公司债券。【原文：The capital flowing into India as it joins global bond indexes will gradually trickle into company notes, according to one of the few women to run a firm in the country’s $2 trillion fixed-income market.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行行长豪瑟称经常账户盈余可能不会持续
item.description: 澳大利亚储备银行二号人物安德鲁-豪瑟（Andrew Hauser）说，澳大利亚连续五年的经常账户盈余可能不会持续下去，即使持续下去，澳大利亚经济仍需要大量外国投资。【原文：Australia’s five-year streak of current account surpluses may not persist, Reserve Bank No. 2 Andrew Hauser said, and even if they do, the economy will still need a lot of foreign investment.】

item.title: 据说日本财务省准备进行人事变动
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本财务省预计将在未来几天内宣布一系列预定的人事变动。【原文：Japan’s Ministry of Finance is expected to announce a series of scheduled personnel changes in coming days, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 埃及耗资 100 亿美元的风电场将于 2026 年破土动工
item.description: 一家相关公司表示，世界上最大的风力发电场之一将于 2026 年 3 月在埃及开工建设，因为炎热夏季的严重断电凸显了这个北非国家的能源需求。【原文：Construction of one of the world’s biggest wind farms in Egypt will begin by March 2026, a company involved said, as grueling power cuts during a broiling summer highlight the North African nation’s energy needs.】

item.title: 高盛亚洲资深投资人黄宗智加入硅谷风险投资公司
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Stephen Wong, a veteran Goldman Sachs Group Inc. investment banker, will join technology venture capital firm Valley Capital Partners, marking a rare move to the buy-side by one of the US banking giant’s senior Asia bankers.】

item.title: 波音获准恢复向中国交付宽体喷气机
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在中国航空安全监管部门完成对一个关键驾驶舱部件的技术审查后，波音公司已获准恢复向中国的航空公司交付宽体喷气式飞机。【原文：Boeing Co. has been cleared to resume delivering wide-body jets to carriers in China after the nation’s air safety regulator completed its technical review of a key cockpit component, according to people briefed on the matter.】

item.title: 卡齐米尔称欧洲央行今年可能只会再降息一次
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员彼得-卡齐米尔说，借贷成本有可能在 2024 年再下调一次。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Peter Kazimir said one more reduction in borrowing costs is likely in 2024.】

item.title: 日本最大机场之一成田机场面临航空燃油短缺问题
item.description: 日本国内机场一直受到喷气机燃油短缺的影响，现在这一影响已扩大到日本最大的机场之一。【原文：A jet fuel shortage in Japan that’s been impacting the nation’s domestic airports has now expanded to one of its largest aerodromes.】

item.title: 日本激进基金罕见地赢得大同董事会席位
item.description: 一家日本基金取得了重大胜利，获得了服装公司大同（Daidoh Ltd.）的董事会职位，这表明激进投资者在该国的影响力日益增强。【原文：A Japanese fund scored a major victory in securing board positions at clothing firm Daidoh Ltd., in a show of growing influence of activist investors in the country.】

item.title: 莱恩称欧洲央行将灵活决定利率路径
item.description: 欧洲中央银行首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩（Philip Lane）表示，在经济不确定的情况下，欧洲中央银行在决定下一步政策措施时已做好应对任何意外的准备。【原文：The European Central Bank is ready to respond to any surprises as it decides on its next policy steps amid uncertainty in the economy, Chief Economist Philip Lane said.】

item.title: 建筑商远洋集团在香港遭遇清盘请愿
item.description: 据香港司法网站报道，中国开发商远洋集团控股有限公司已收到香港法院的清盘申请。【原文：Chinese developer Sino-Ocean Group Holding Ltd has received a winding-up petition in a Hong Kong court, according to the city’s judiciary website.】

item.title: 最早打开中国市场的美国企业家
item.description:
"中国制造 "是如何诞生的

 

【原文：

How "Made In China" first became a thing

 

】

item.title: 韩元交易时间延长，韩国向银行求助
item.description: 韩国敦促当地银行和金融公司在下周韩元交易时间延长后积极参与在岸韩元交易。【原文：South Korea urged local banks and financial companies to actively participate in trading the onshore won when hours extend next week.】

item.title: 俄罗斯向乌克兰前线派遣了约 10,000 名移民
item.description: 俄罗斯在加大力度对其最新国民实施军事登记后，已将大约 10,000 名最近获得公民身份的移民部署到乌克兰前线。【原文：Russia has deployed roughly 10,000 immigrants who recently received citizenship to the front in Ukraine after ramping up efforts to enforce military registration among its newest nationals.】

item.title: 彭博社法国民调：勒庞集团取得更多优势
item.description: 据彭博社的民意调查显示，玛丽娜-勒庞领导的极右翼国民阵线在周日举行的法国临时立法选举第一轮投票前巩固了其领先地位。【原文：Marine Le Pen’s far-right National Rally has strengthened its lead ahead of the first round of France’s snap legislative election on Sunday, according to Bloomberg’s poll of polls.】

item.title: 大同 "布鲁克斯 "股东大会，战略 C 提案，任命三名董事。
item.description: 服装制造商大同（DAIDOH LIMITED）于 6 月 27 日在东京召开了年度股东大会，并宣布了由激进派（同时也是议论纷纷的股东）战略资本公司（Strategic Capital）提议的三位董事会候选人的任命。【原文：アパレルメーカーのダイドーリミテッドは27日、都内で定時株主総会を開き、アクティビスト（物言う株主）のストラテジックキャピタルが提案した取締役候補３人を選任したと発表した。】

item.title: 美国特使称中国与欧洲在支持俄罗斯问题上出现误判
item.description: 美国驻华最高外交官警告说，北京错误地估计了支持俄罗斯乌克兰战争对其与欧洲关系的影响。【原文：Beijing misjudged the impact on its relationship with Europe by providing support for Russia’s war in Ukraine, America’s top diplomat in China warned.】

item.title: 印度新政府计划在预算中采取 "历史性步骤
item.description: 印度总统表示，新政府正计划在其首份预算中宣布重大措施，以推动经济走向未来。【原文：India’s president said the new government is planning to announce significant measures in its first budget as it seeks to propel the economy into the future.】

item.title: 丰田将以 10 亿美元的交易出售零部件制造商爱信的股份
item.description: 丰田汽车公司正在出售其在主要汽车零部件供应商爱信公司（Aisin Corp.【原文：Toyota Motor Corp. is selling its shares in Aisin Corp., a major vehicle parts supplier, the latest sign momentum is building in Japan’s push to get large companies to unwind their cross shareholdings.】

item.title: 弱势日元对日本股市的影响力正在瓦解
item.description: 日元暴跌已经到了无法再提振日本股市的地步。【原文：The slump in the yen has gone so far that it’s no longer giving a boost to Japanese stocks.】

item.title: 外国基金抛售日本股票，创 2023 年 3 月以来最长跌势
item.description: 外国投资者连续第五周抛售日本股票，创下自去年 3 月以来最长的连续抛售纪录，当时日本股市即将开启历史性的反弹。【原文：Foreign investors offloaded Japanese shares for a fifth week, marking the longest selling streak since last March, when the nation’s stock market was about to kick off its historic rally.】

item.title: Quant Mutual 的客户在印度调查后数日内撤资 1.68 亿美元
item.description: Quant Mutual Fund 称，在印度基金业的后起之秀卷入该国市场监管机构的调查后，截至本周三，客户在三天内撤资约 1.68 亿美元。【原文：Quant Mutual Fund said clients pulled about $168 million in three days through Wednesday after the rising star of India’s fund industry was ensnared in a probe by the nation’s markets regulator.】

item.title: 拉胡尔-甘地在莫迪阴影下多年后与莫迪同台竞技
item.description: 多年来，拉胡尔-甘地和他的政治盟友一直在低位眼睁睁地看着纳伦德拉-莫迪总理巩固其在印度全国的权力。【原文：For years, Rahul Gandhi and his political allies watched from a lowly perch as Prime Minister Narendra Modi consolidated his power across India.】

item.title: 勒梅尔称法国税收收入增加 30 亿欧元
item.description: 财政部长布鲁诺-勒梅尔（Bruno Le Maire）表示，由于税收收入高于预期，法国国库得到了加强，就在第一轮立法选举的前几天，他对经济的预期更加乐观。【原文：Finance Minister Bruno Le Maire said French state coffers have been strengthened by higher-than-expected tax earnings, projecting more optimism about the economy just days before the first round of legislative elections.】

item.title: 麦格理预测中国存在扩大人民币交易区间的风险
item.description: 据麦格理集团（Macquarie Group）称，随着人民币继续测试其日限额的较弱一端，中国可能会考虑扩大人民币交易区间。【原文：China may consider widening the yuan trading band as the currency continues to test the weaker end of its daily limit, according to Macquarie Group.】

item.title: 澳大利亚第二大养老基金称澳洲央行不会在八月加息
item.description: 澳大利亚第二大养老基金--澳大利亚退休信托基金（Australian Retirement Trust）称，货币市场错误地认为储备银行将在下次政策会议上恢复加息。【原文：Australian Retirement Trust, the nation’s second-largest pension fund, says money markets are mistaken in betting the Reserve Bank will resume raising interest rates at its next policy meeting.】
